original_text: “A lay person shall not eat of a holy thing; no foreign guest of the priest or hired worker shall eat of a holy thing,
korean_text: 일반인은 성물을 먹지 못할 것이며 제사장의 객이나 품꾼도 다 성물을 먹지 못할 것이니라

sentences.original_text: A lay person shall not eat of a holy thing
no foreign guest of the priest
or hired worker shall eat of a holy thing
sentences.korean_translation: 또는 품꾼도 거룩한 것을 먹지 못하리라
